source_objects.title: Travel
source_objects.description: Discover new tricks when planning a trip, budgeting for a vacation, keeping a record or journel from an adventure, and much more.

items.title: Wilderness Survival & Backpacking For Adventures
items.headline: Learn the survival and camping skills required to have the most beautiful backpacking adventures in the wilderness.
objectives_summary: Wilderness Backpacking
Fire Making
Using Cutting Tools like Knifes and Machetes

items.title: How to Travel Around the World on a Budget
items.headline: The Most Complete and Updated Travel Course! Get the Best Travel Tips to Plan your World Trip without breaking the bank!
objectives_summary: You will be able to save tons of money during your travels
You will be able to Travel longer, cheaper and better
You will know how to stay safe and healthy while traveling around the world

items.title: Social Media Marketing : Hospitality & Travel Professionals

visible_instructors.title: Brian Cliette
visible_instructors.name: Brian
visible_instructors.job_title: Digital Growth Marketer, Entrepreneur, Content Creator

items.headline: Learn to Leverage Facebook, Pinterest, Twitter, Google+, Instagram for Your Travel, Hotel or Hospitality based business
objectives_summary: How to use the best channels and social media outlets to reach as much of your market demographic as possible, as well as how to maintain a positive presence on those outlets
How to take advantage of a blog to generate positive reviews and feedback for your hotel
How to monetize various social media outlets such as yelp and pinterest to achieve an even greater profit margin for your hotel

items.title: INTERNET MARKETING MASTERY - Learn how to Earn Money Online

visible_instructors.title: Ricky Shetty
visible_instructors.name: Ricky
visible_instructors.job_title: Daddy Blogger, World Traveller, and Digital Nomad

items.headline: Discover Location Independent Careers that Allow You to Travel the World While You Work
objectives_summary: Discover the opportunities available for remote workers
Have ideas for income earning businesses, freelance and careers that are location independent

items.title: Travel Hacking: How to Travel the World for Next to Nothing

visible_instructors.title: Huntly Mayo Malasky
visible_instructors.name: Huntly
visible_instructors.job_title: Entrepreneur, Personal Finance Blogger, Travel Hacker

items.headline: A step-by-step system for using award travel to pay for all your future trips and vacations
objectives_summary: Become an expert Travel Hacker
Learn how to never pay full price for airfare or hotels again
Learn to secure completely free flights

items.title: BLOG MASTERY - How to Make, Market, and Monetize your Blog

visible_instructors.title: Ricky Shetty
visible_instructors.name: Ricky
visible_instructors.job_title: Daddy Blogger, World Traveller, and Digital Nomad

items.headline: Creating a Successful Travel Blog
objectives_summary: Use your blog to build an email list
Build a following using Social Media
Optimize your Blog for Search Engine / Google rankings

items.title: Read Russian
items.headline: Break the Secret Code and Learn Cyrillic
objectives_summary: Read and understand hundreds and hundreds of words in Russian without learning the language!

items.title: Introduction to Lifestyle Design and Digital Nomad Mindset

visible_instructors.title: Jimmy Naraine Support
visible_instructors.name: Jimmy Naraine
visible_instructors.job_title: Winner of Udemy Innovation Award teaching 223,000+ people

items.headline: Concise intro course to building a digital nomad lifestyle, becoming location independent and traveling smart
objectives_summary: Learn how to define a compelling vision for your life and set exciting goals
Learn how to design your dream lifestyle
Understand the concept of lifestyle design

items.title: How to be a Tour Guide in your Hometown Overnight
items.headline: Deliver an engaging 1 hour walking tour around a local town or city and become a trusted tour guide for visitors
objectives_summary: Give a one hour walking tour to a small group around their home town.

items.title: Leave the Rat Race, Sail the World, and Fund your Adventure

visible_instructors.title: Charlie Borland
visible_instructors.name: Charlie
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Photographer for 30+ years and Lighting Master

items.headline: Learn how easy and cheap it can be to crew on boats and see paradise as few do, and on the cheap.
objectives_summary: Understand the steps to becoming a valued sailboat crew member
Overview of navigation tools, safety, health, & staying connected to family/job/finances
Live a fabulous lifestyle while making money from a variety of opportunities

items.title: How To Become a Digital Nomad: The Ultimate Travel Hack

visible_instructors.title: Dan Johnston
visible_instructors.name: Dan
visible_instructors.job_title: Location Independent Coach, Author, and Business Trainer

items.headline: Leave the 9-5 and Join The Lifestyle Design Movement! No 'Travel Hacking', Credit Cards or Airline Points Required
objectives_summary: Live Anywhere You Want While Earning a Great Income
Separate Your Income From Location For Total Freedom and 100% Location Independence
Ditch Your Desk For Cafes, Patios, Beaches or Co-Working Spaces Around The World

items.title: Deep Travel: Have Adventures No Guidebook Can Tell You About

visible_instructors.title: Dave Fox
visible_instructors.name: Dave
visible_instructors.job_title: Travel Author / Writing and Personal Development Coach

items.headline: Travel safely and confidently in foreign countries. Go beyond mainstream tourism & have life-changing travel experiences
objectives_summary: Thrive in foreign environments and embrace the joy of culture shock.
Gently stretch the limits of your culture shock boundaries, moving deeper and deeper into big adventures.
Make authentic connections with local residents in the places you visit – even when there are thick language and cultural barriers.

items.title: Buy cheap plane tickets for 10% of their initial price.
items.headline: Learn secret tricks on how to save up to 90% on your plane tickets.
objectives_summary: Easly search for cheap plane tickets offers
Speak secret language use by promotion hunters community
Know their rights as passengers

items.title: Become a Successful International House Sitter

visible_instructors.title: Ian Usher
visible_instructors.name: Ian
visible_instructors.job_title: House Sitting Magazine Publisher | Fulltime World Traveller

items.headline: House Sitters - learn how to get the best pet and house sitting jobs all over the world
objectives_summary: Save a considerable amount on travel accommodation costs
Select and register with the world's most successful house sitting websites
Learn secret marketing strategies to secure any housesit

items.title: Travel The World And Get Paid - Work For Luxury Hotels
items.headline: Start an exciting career in the world of luxury hotels & resorts, travel the world and paid for it!
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will be able to apply for various jobs within the hotel industry.
You will learn about a large number of entry level jobs and how you can climb the career ladder.
You will learn about the necessary skills & requirements and how to develop those.

items.title: Blogging; Travel Writing; Travel Content Writing Certificate
items.headline: Travel; Write; Blog; Content Writing; Travel To Great Places Includes Coverage Of The Business Side of Being A Writer
objectives_summary: Learn How To Write About Travel In A Way That Sells
Know The Benefits Of Travel Blogging
Learn What It Takes To Make Money Writing
